content: Adds new "ProductPurchaseChannel" field to the ProcessReceipt API with enums (Unknown, InExperience, ExperienceDetailsPage) to inform developers of the sale channel for the purchase.
Adds a visual editor for Class.AudioCompressor and Class.AudioLimiter instances.
"Save as local plugin" now always saves a .rbxmx file to preserve RunContext information. "Save as file" can still be used to obtain a .lua file, and .lua plugins will still run as expected.
Adds Class.AudioAnalyzer.WindowSize and Class.AudioPitchShifter.WindowSize properties, which can be used to adjust responsiveness against quality.
Fixes a crash in the new Luau type solver beta where duplicate keys in a table literal always causes Studio to crash.
Allow layered clothing to be previewed on Avatar Bodies created using WrapDeformer before publishing.
Reduces how long it takes to find the desired time position in a Class.VideoFrame.
Beta Constraint Tool preserves existing initial attachments when using escape to cancel.
Removes invalid unicode handling for characters in error logs on Windows.
The Controls Emulator widget is only visible now when a placefile is open.
Improves trackpad behavior for Chromebooks.
Fixes a bug in Luau's type system where extending tables copied with table.clone would cause the types of both tables to be inaccurately combined.

Deprecates the Class.AudioPlayer.AssetId property, which was a string, and replaces it with AudioPlayer.Asset, which is of type Content. This autocompletes rbxassetid:// in studio when typing numbers into the text box.
Fixed an issue that made scripts in plugins with the Plugin RunContext not run.
Class.WrapDeformer now respects its CageOrigin property rather than using the position of its sibling WrapTarget.
Mention task.wait() in the warning message for calling task.wait(t) or task.delay(t, f) where t is NaN or infinity.
Fixed a crash when connection is made to a signal that doesn't exist (e.g. Instance.StyledPropertiesChanged).
Resolved some Beta Constraint Tool errors when not hovering over a BasePart.
Class.UserInputService.TouchEnabled will be set to true for windows touch devices.
Added a warning in the Output console window when a sound fails to load in an AudioPlayer.
Fixes an issue causing Class.Sound.DidLoop to sometimes trigger more than once after a loop.
Memory profiler now shows separate items for terrain textures vs. terrain meshes under GPU memory. Previously this was counted together.
